pullrequest.title: enhanced with the pkgs needed to compile it with ubuntu 14.04

content.raw:
I think that these set of dependencies should be covered by the "Install Required Dependencies" step at the beggining of the tutorial. The rendering usually does not help to see that you should go through this step before going forward, I think that the index helps. My intention is to decline the PR if my previous step makes sense to you.

Thanks!
